        <div class="eprivacy-container">
          <div class="left-column">
            <div class="h4">Cookies on Which?</div>
            <p>We place cookies on your computer to maximise your experience on our websites and to help us make these websites better.  If you continue to use our websites we'll assume that you are happy with this. You can change your cookie settings at any time.</p>
          </div>
          <div class="right-column">
            <p>
            <a href="#" class="button button-simple primary" id="eprivacy-submit">Accept</a>

            </p>

<!--[if IE ]>
<div id="ie-compatibility-message">
  <div class="grid">It looks like you're using an older version of Internet Explorer, so unfortunately things might not be displaying as they should. To get the most out of the Which? University website, please upgrade your internet browser or install an alternative free browser such as <a href="https://support.google.com/chrome/answer/95346?hl=en-GB">Google Chrome</a> or <a href="https://www.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/new/">Mozilla Firefox</a>.
</div>
</div>
<![endif]-->

<!-- ======== ABOUT US TAB - START ======== --> <div class="quicklink"> <div class="column oneofthree mob-button"> <h2 class="highlight-a main-link-button">About us<span class="more-less icon-more"></span></h2> <div class="description"> Which? exists to make people as powerful as the organisations that affect their lives. We don't accept any advertising, freebies or sponsorship. All our research and campaigning is completely independent and funded by subscriptions.</div> </div> <div class="column twoofthree main-links"> <ul>

Directory <span class="icon-right"></span></a></h3> <div> <ul> <li> Can't find what you're looking for? Access the complete A-Z directory of Which? Sites.</li> </ul> </div> </li> 

<!-- ======== ABOUT US TAB - WHICH? NEWS ======== --> <li class="link-set"> <h3><a href="http://www.which.co.uk/news/#?intcmp=GNH.About-Us.News">Which? News <span class="icon- right"></span></a></h3> <div> <ul> <li>Get the latest news on our research and the consumer issues that affect you.</li> </ul> </div> </li> 

<!-- ======== ABOUT US TAB - MONEY HELPLINE ======== --> <li class="link-set"> <h3><a href="http://www.which.co.uk/about-which/what-we-offer/which-money-helpline/#? intcmp=GNH.About-Us.Which-Money-Helpline">Money Helpline <span class="icon-right"></span></a></h3> <div> <ul> <li> Expert, unbiased information and guidance to help our members make the best financial decisions.</li> </ul> </div> </li> 

<!-- ======== ABOUT US TAB - COMPUTING HELPDESK ======== --> <li class="link-set"> <h3><a href="http://www.which.co.uk/magazine/computing/#?intcmp=GNH.About-Us.Computing-Helpdesk">Computing Helpdesk <span class="icon-right"></span></a></h3> <div> <ul> <li> Jargon-free technical support and buying advice to help make sense of our members' computing issues. </li> </ul> </div> </li> </ul> </div> </div> 

<!-- ======== ABOUT US TAB - FINISH ======== --> </div><!--end of quicklinks-->

          <!--CMS Content End-->

        </div>

			<div class="grid">
			<div id = "feature-text">
				<div><h1 class="light"><span>What to study, where to go and how to get there...</span></h1></div>

        <div class="grid">
				<h2>Stay on top of your uni choices</h2>
				<div id = "find-us">
					<div class="white-box">
						<h4 class="blue"><a href="/about/sign-up-for-updates">We&#39;ll keep you updated with alerts, news and help where you need it.</a></h4>
						<a class="btn__red" href="/about/sign-up-for-updates">Newsletter sign-up<img src="http://dtmw9u23bb9ya.cloudfront.net/assets/icon-arrow-right-fab5e9b51baf21f21aca2a3ffa9ecae7.png" alt="Icon arrow right" /></a>
						<p>or join us on:</p>
						<div class="share inline">
              <a href="https://www.facebook.com/WhichUniversity"><img src="http://dtmw9u23bb9ya.cloudfront.net/assets/share--facebook-f5716d60f3a39728efdad4796c6ebdbb.svg" alt="Share  facebook" /></a>
              <a href="https://twitter.com/WhichuniUK"><img src="http://dtmw9u23bb9ya.cloudfront.net/assets/share--twitter-8cae329fc45da03dd10a75433ec2083d.svg" alt="Share  twitter" /></a>
              <a href="https://plus.google.com/b/111834104050263907986/111834104050263907986/posts"><img src="http://dtmw9u23bb9ya.cloudfront.net/assets/share--googleplus-d7ae99b3fb9b3748064e9ce336b085e2.svg" alt="Share  googleplus" /></a>
              <a href="http://www.youtube.com/user/whichuniuk"><img src="http://dtmw9u23bb9ya.cloudfront.net/assets/share--youtube-59baa16b1d5d0b04f74599e75a4e03de.svg" alt="Share  youtube" /></a>

					</div>
				</div>
				<h2 class="headstart-heading">Get a headstart...</h2>
				<div id="headstart">
					<div class="white-box">
						<span class="heading"> <h4>Not sure what you want to do yet? We can help with that, too.  Try browsing these popular topics:</h4> </span>
						<ul class="tag-cloud clearfix">
							<li class="tag-words__blue">
								<a href="/advice/help-i-dont-know-what-course-to-choose-what-do-i-do">Help! I don&#39;t know what course to choose - what do I do?</a>
							</li>
							<li class="tag-words__blue">
								<a href="/advice/what-a-levels-do-you-need-for-the-degree-you-want-to-study">What A-levels do you need for the degree you want to study?</a>
							</li>

							</li>

    <div class="footer">
  <div class="footer-container">
    <div class="grid--gutter">
      <h2>Browse expert advice</h2>
      <ul class="tag-words">
        <li>
          <a href="http://university.which.co.uk/search/advice?a[q]=*&amp;a[categories][]=most_popular">Most popular</a>
        </li>
        <li>
          <a href="http://university.which.co.uk/search/advice?a[q]=*&amp;a[categories][]=a_level">A-levels, BTECs &amp; Highers</a>
        </li>
        <li>
          <a href="http://university.which.co.uk/search/advice?a[q]=*&amp;a[categories][]=personal_statements">Personal statements</a>
        </li>
        <li>
          <a href="http://university.which.co.uk/search/advice?a[q]=*&amp;a[categories][]=applying">UCAS application</a>
        </li>
        <li>
          <a href="http://university.which.co.uk/search/advice?a[q]=*&amp;a[categories][]=finding">Finding the right course</a>
        </li>
        <li>
          <a href="http://university.which.co.uk/search/advice?a[q]=*&amp;a[categories][]=choosing">Choosing a university</a>
        </li>
        <li>
          <a href="http://university.which.co.uk/search/advice?a[q]=*&amp;a[categories][]=gcse">GCSEs &amp; early choices</a>
        </li>
        <li>
          <a href="http://university.which.co.uk/search/advice?a[q]=*&amp;a[categories][]=clearing">Clearing</a>
        </li>
        <li>
          <a href="http://university.which.co.uk/search/advice?a[q]=*&amp;a[categories][]=open_days">Open days</a>
        </li>
        <li>
          <a href="http://university.which.co.uk/search/advice?a[q]=*&amp;a[categories][]=finance">Student finance</a>
        </li>
        <li>
          <a href="http://university.which.co.uk/search/advice?a[q]=*&amp;a[categories][]=student_life">Student life</a>
        </li>
        <li>
          <a href="http://university.which.co.uk/search/advice?a[q]=*&amp;a[categories][]=accommodation">Student accommodation</a>
        </li>
        <li>
          <a href="http://university.which.co.uk/search/advice?a[q]=*&amp;a[categories][]=preparing">Preparing for university</a>
        </li>
        <li>
          <a href="http://university.which.co.uk/search/advice?a[q]=*&amp;a[categories][]=prospects">Graduate prospects</a>
        </li>
        <li>
          <a href="http://university.which.co.uk/search/advice?a[q]=*&amp;a[categories][]=parents">Advice for parents</a>
        </li>
        <li>
          <a href="http://university.which.co.uk/search/advice?a[q]=*&amp;a[categories][]=teachers">Teacher resources</a>
        </li>
      </ul>
    </div>
    <div class="grid--gutter">
      <div class="grid--4of12 footer--about">
        <h5>About this site</h5>
        <ul class="outer"><li class="inner"><a class="footer-link link" href="/about">About us</a></li><li class="inner"><a class="footer-link link" href="/about/contact-us">Contact us</a></li><li class="inner"><a class="footer-link link" href="/about/cookie-policy">Cookie policy</a></li><li class="inner"><a class="footer-link link" href="/about/privacy-policy">Privacy policy</a></li><li class="inner"><a class="footer-link link" href="/about/sign-up-for-updates">Sign up to our newsletters</a></li><li class="inner"><a class="footer-link link" href="/about/terms-and-conditions">Terms and conditions</a></li><li class="inner"><a class="footer-link link" href="/about/where-we-get-our-info">Where we get our info</a></li><li class="inner"><a class="footer-link link" href="/about/who-we-work-with">Who we work with</a></li></ul>
      </div>
      <div class="grid--4of12 footer--partners">
        <h5>Our partners</h5>
        <a href="http://www.nus.org.uk/"><img src="http://dtmw9u23bb9ya.cloudfront.net/assets/logos/nus-b634471aaf34a9589171253866732376.png" alt="Nus" /></a>
        <p>The National Union of Students (NUS) supports Which? University as an independent source of information and advice for anyone considering higher education. We&#39;re working with NUS to bring you exclusive insights from student unions in universities and colleges across the UK.</p>
      </div>
      <div class="grid--4of12 footer--work">
        <h5>Who we work with</h5>
